UniqueId.description: Unique identifier of the item, typically refers to the full page type, e.g., 'AppNameSpace.Views.BlankPage'

Title.description: Displayed in both the NavigationViewItem and the GridView Item on the LandingPage

SectionId.description: Globally section id of this item

ImagePath.description: Used as an image for both GridView and NavigationView items, with the format: 'ms-appx:///Assets/Icon.png'.

IconGlyph.description: If specified, this will be used in the NavigationViewItem instead of ImagePath. Format can be a Unicode string like 'E709' or an icon glyph itself.

Parameter.description: Specify a parameter if there are multiple pages with the same UniqueId

LocalizeId.description: Specify a Resource Key for Localization, UsexUid should be enabled

DefaultBuiltInNavigationViewInfoBadgeSty.description: Specify a Resource Key for default Built In NavigationView InfoBadge Style

DefaultBuiltInLandingPageInfoBadgeStyle.description: Specify a Resource Key for default Built In LandingPage InfoBadge Style

UseBuiltInNavigationViewInfoBadgeStyle.description: Indicates whether the built-in style should be applied to the InfoBadge within the NavigationView. If enabled, the control will use a default predefined style unless an item explicitly defines its own style key.

UseBuiltInLandingPageInfoBadgeStyle.description: Indicates whether the built-in style should be applied to the InfoBadge on the landing page. If set to true, a predefined default style will be used unless a specific style is provided for an individual item.

IsSpecialSection.description: Indicates that this section is not a regular section but is added to the navigation differently

HideGroup.description: If true, the item is hidden from the NavigationView

ShowItemsWithoutGroup.description: If true, the items in NavigationView will be shown without a group or parent

IsExpanded.description: If true, the item in NavigationView will be Expanded

IsNavigationViewItemHeader.description: Indicates if this is a NavigationViewItemHeader

IsFooterNavigationViewItem.description: Indicates if this should be added in NavigationView FooterMenuItems

UsexUid.description: Indicates whether to use a Uid for localization

Order.description: A boolean value that specifies whether to apply ordering to the result set. When set to true, the results will be sorted in ascending order by default. If set to false, no specific ordering is applied.

OrderByDescending.description: A boolean value that specifies whether to sort the results in descending order. If set to true, the results will be ordered from highest to lowest. This option only applies when Order is enabled.

HideNavigationViewItemIcon.description: If true, the icon is hidden from the NavigationViewItem

InfoBadgeValue.description: Represents Text content displayed inside the InfoBadge. This could be a keyword like 'NEW', 'UPDATED', or a numeric indicator.

NavigationViewInfoBadgeStyle.description: Specifies the resource key of the style applied to the InfoBadge shown in the NavigationView.

LandingPageInfoBadgeStyle.description: Defines the resource key for the style of the InfoBadge on the landing page.

IsLandingPageInfoBadgeHidden.description: Indicates whether the InfoBadge on the landing page should be hidden from view. When true, the badge is not rendered.

IsNavigationViewInfoBadgeHidden.description: Determines whether the InfoBadge within the NavigationView should be visible. Set to true to hide the badge.

Items.description: Items that will appear in the NavigationView and GridView

UniqueId.description: Unique identifier of the item, typically refers to the full page type, e.g., 'AppNameSpace.Views.BlankPage'

SectionId.description: Globally section id of this item

Title.description: Displayed in both the NavigationViewItem and the GridView Item on the LandingPage

Parameter.description: Specify a parameter if there are multiple pages with the same UniqueId

LocalizeId.description: Specify a Resource Key for Localization, UsexUid should be enabled

Subtitle.description: Only shown in the GridView Item on the LandingPage

ImagePath.description: Used as an image for both GridView and NavigationView items, with the format: 'ms-appx:///Assets/Icon.png'.

IconGlyph.description: If specified, this will be used in the NavigationViewItem instead of ImagePath. Format can be a Unicode string like 'E709' or an icon glyph itself.

IsNew.description: Indicates if this item is newly added and shows a dot on the overview card in the GridView

IsUpdated.description: Indicates if this item is updated and shows a dot on the overview card in the GridView

IsPreview.description: Indicates if this item is in a preview state

HideItem.description: If true, the item is hidden from the GridView

HideNavigationViewItem.description: If true, the item is hidden from the NavigationView

HideNavigationViewItemIcon.description: If true, the icon is hidden from the NavigationViewItem

IncludedInBuild.description: Indicates if this item is included in the build

IsNavigationViewItemHeader.description: Indicates if this is a NavigationViewItemHeader

UsexUid.description: Indicates whether to use a Uid for localization

Extra.description: Array of names of related items
